Merged_Standards.Integration: Linked with ISO 50001 (Performance evaluation) and BRSR Principle 7 (Transparency).
Merged_Standards.Example: Tracking monthly water-consumption and waste-generation trends to assess reduction progress.

Merged_Standards.Title: Internal audit
Merged_Standards.Purpose: Conduct periodic audits to ensure EMS conformity and identify improvement opportunities.
Merged_Standards.Evidence: Audit program, checklists, reports, corrective-action logs.
Merged_Standards.Integration: Aligned with ISO 19011 (Auditing) and ISO 9001 clause 9.2 (Internal audit).
Merged_Standards.Example: Quarterly internal EMS audits covering waste, emissions, and legal compliance.

Merged_Standards.Title: Management review
Merged_Standards.Purpose: Top management reviews EMS performance to ensure alignment with strategic direction and environmental policy.
Merged_Standards.Evidence: Review minutes, inputs and outputs, action-tracking sheets.
Merged_Standards.Integration: Connected to ISO 9001 clause 9.3 and supports ESG Governance review processes.
Merged_Standards.Example: Annual review discussing energy savings achieved and new sustainability targets.

Merged_Standards.Title: Nonconformity and corrective action
Merged_Standards.Purpose: Respond to environmental nonconformities, determine root causes, and implement corrective actions.
Merged_Standards.Evidence: Non-conformance reports, root-cause analyses, CAPA records.
Merged_Standards.Integration: Linked with ISO 9001 clause 10.2 and ISO 45001 clause 10.2.
Merged_Standards.Example: Investigating and correcting improper hazardous-waste labeling found during audit.

Merged_Standards.Title: Continual improvement
Merged_Standards.Purpose: Continually improve EMS effectiveness by enhancing environmental performance and achieving sustainability goals.
Merged_Standards.Evidence: Improvement logs, KPIs, project reports, performance-trend analysis.
Merged_Standards.Integration: Supports SDG 12 & 13 and aligns with the PDCA ‘Act’ phase.
Merged_Standards.Example: Replacing diesel generators with solar panels to reduce carbon emissions year-on-year.
